item.title: Astroville Tunnel Tour of Downtown Houston (Air-Conditioned)
item.description: Visit multiple areas of Houston’s underground tunnel system without the worry of getting lost when you book this Downtown Houston underground tunnel tour. Spend time underground with a guide who knows the ins and outs of the tunnels well, as you hear stories and fun facts about Houston. See large skyscrapers, one of the largest banks in Downtown Houston, and impressive architecture, too.

image.alt: Astroville Tunnel Tour of Downtown Houston (Air-Conditioned)

item.title: Haunted Houston Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: Explore the historic district of downtown Houston on a leisurely walking tour that combines a pub crawl with ghost stories recounted by your costumed guide. Your 2.5-hour evening walking tour visits four bars located in historic buildings that each boast spooky stories. Have time to sip a drink (own expense) as your guide illuminates the history of Houston through tales of rumored hauntings and other spine-tingling tales.

image.alt: Haunted Houston Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour

item.title: Houston Sightseeing Tour 2.5-hour Air-Conditioned Van Tour
item.description: A good choice for first-time visitors to Houston, this tour offers a comprehensive overview of the city. Visit several well-known landmarks, parks, and stadiums including historic Market Square, Discovery Green, Toyota Center, Minute Maid Park, Buffalo Bayou, and more. You’ll also have an opportunity to admire the lavish homes and boutiques in River Oaks. A local guide shares insider information about what to see, where to eat, and what to do while you’re in town.

image.alt: Houston Sightseeing Tour 2.5-hour Air-Conditioned Van Tour

item.title: Astroville Best of Houston City Driving Tour with Live Guide
item.description: Ideal for first-time visitors interested in an efficient orientation, this tour provides easy first-hand views of Houston’s top architecture, historical landmarks, green spaces, and sporting venues. Hop on your shared shuttle and explore downtown, the Museum District, the “graffiti art” district, and more in just a few hours of sightseeing.

image.alt: Astroville Best of Houston City Driving Tour with Live Guide

item.title: Astroville Food Tour of Downtown Houston with Tunnel Access
item.description:
Foodies wanted! Come enjoy diverse plates in Downtown Houston at some of the city's most famous restaurants. This tour will begin at the Historic Market Square Park (outside Niko Niko's) where you will learn about Houston's rich history, beautiful architecture, & diverse cultures.
The tour consists of 3 local favorite stops where you will try 8-9 delicious food samplings including authentic Mexico City cuisine, traditional Asian novelties, Houston's unique take on Italian-American, and gourmet dessert. These meals are pre-ordered & will be coming out fresh for your group.
In addition, guests will enjoy views of the tallest building in Texas, largest theater district in Texas, & private limited access into largest downtown tunnel system in the USA as a third of our food tour is spent down below! Note, all restaurant stops are air-conditioned and sit down.
** If anyone in your group has food allergies, please contact us before the tour. Plate modifications may have a fee. **

image.alt: Astroville Food Tour of Downtown Houston with Tunnel Access

item.title: Private Sightseeing Cart Tour of Houston
item.description: Explore the downtown area of Houston onboard in an enclosed golf cart during this fun excursion. Join your private guide and ride around the streets of Houston in your cart, learning about the city as you go. Stop at several points of interest and picturesque spots to capture photos and get more in-depth information.

image.alt: Private Sightseeing Cart Tour of Houston

item.title: The Escape Game Houston: 60-Minute Adventures at The Galleria
item.description: Try and escape from one of five chosen adventures in this Houston escape room experience located in The Galleria. You’ll have to solve clues and puzzles in order to get your way out of here. Groups are small- 12 max- so use all your brain power to have fun and get out in time. This takes about an hour, and you have five games/ challenges to choose from.

image.alt: The Escape Game Houston: 60-Minute Adventures at The Galleria

item.title: Trill On Wheels (Hip-Hop Party Bike Tour in 3rd Ward Houston)
item.description: Whether you’re celebrating a bachelor(ette) party, a birthday, or you just want to have fun and see the city at the same time, hip-hop fans will have a great time on this party bike. A curated playlist will boom from the bike’s sound system while you spend two hours on the go with your “Trappin’ Captain”, who’ll serve as your own personal party host.

image.alt: Trill On Wheels (Hip-Hop Party Bike Tour in 3rd Ward Houston)

item.title: Private Houston Mural Instagram Tour by Cart
item.description: Explore Houston’s colorful side and get a collection of Insta-worthy photos along the way. Pose in front of downtown’s most vibrant street art, including hidden murals that even most locals don’t know about. Cover lots of ground in an open-sided electric cart, and get personalized attention and tips from your street-savvy guide on this private tour.

image.alt: Private Houston Mural Instagram Tour by Cart

item.title: Howdy H-Town EADO Food Tour
item.description: See how EADO became one of Houston’s quickly growing neighborhoods, and sample food along the way on this group foodie tour in Houston. Besides food, see graffiti, public green spaces, and learn about the city’s architecture. Make sure you come hungry, since you’ll sample tacos, baked goods, and much more on this walking tour through the city.

image.alt: Howdy H-Town EADO Food Tour

item.title: Private Space Center Houston Day Trip with City Tour
item.description: Secure your ticket in advance to the NASA Space Center and visit Rocket Park, Independence Plaza, and the astronaut training facility. After hotel pickup in a climate-controlled vehicle, see popular landmarks around Houston, stopping briefly for photos during a small-group guided sightseeing tour. With a map and instructions, enjoy the flexibility to explore the space center on your own time, without the stress of rushing.

image.alt: Private Space Center Houston Day Trip with City Tour

item.title: H- Town Tour with 15ft Open Air Party Truck
item.description: Whether you’re celebrating a bachelor(ette), a birthday, or you just want to have fun, meet new people, and see Houston, Texas at the same time, party fans will have a great time on this open-air bus tour. Drive around with your “vibe host”, who’s there as your own personal DJ to keep the good times rolling with party games and classic R&B and Hip Hop tracks.

image.alt: H- Town Tour with 15ft Open Air Party Truck

item.title: Houston Museum of Natural Science and Cockrell Butterfly Center
item.description: When visiting the Houston Museum of Natural Science, take the opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of the butterflies and insects at the Cockrell Butterfly Center and Brown Hall of Entomology. The entrance ticket admits you to both exhibits where you can see both live and preserved specimens, and learn about them with interactive games and displays. Explore a rain forest environment with a 3-floor butterfly habitat, get a close look at a range of insects, and visit a play area for kids.

image.alt: Houston Museum of Natural Science and Cockrell Butterfly Center

item.title: Houston Museum of Natural Science General Admission
item.description: Visit the Houston Museum of Natural Science to see the largest dinosaur hall in North America, check out the extensive collection of rare gems, and stop into your choice of permanent exhibits.

image.alt: Houston Museum of Natural Science General Admission

item.title: Polaris Slingshot Guided Tour in Houston
item.description: Skip the set itinerary and slow pace of a group bus tour and explore northwest Houston’s backroads on board an exciting Polaris Slingshot. Roar along a scenic route through the countryside and past the small towns of the Texas Hill Country on this three-wheeled sports vehicle, taking in the views as you feel the thrill of top speeds on the open road. Explore for as little as an hour or opt for a longer experience.

image.alt: Polaris Slingshot Guided Tour in Houston

item.title: Private Houston Brewery Tour by Cart
item.description: Houston is home to a thriving craft beer and brewery scene, but it can be hard to decide where to drink. Remove the guesswork and let a guide take you on a personalized bar crawl to several of Houston’s best watering holes, from small-batch distilleries to cozy pubs and cutting-edge craft breweries (drinks own expense). Save yourself a long walk by riding in an eco-friendly electric cart, and admire some colorful street murals along the way.

image.alt: Private Houston Brewery Tour by Cart

item.title: Houston CityPASS®
item.description: Maximize your time in the spectacular city of Houston with an indispensable Houston Mobile Ticket. Your mobile ticket includes free admission to the Space Center Houston plus enjoy free entry to four additional attractions of your choice and choose from a variety including the Museum of Fine Arts, home to more than 60,000 artworks, or the Houston Zoo, Kemah Boardwalk All-Day Ride Pass, the Children's Museum of Houston, Downtown Aquarium, or the Houston Museum of Natural Science

image.alt: Houston CityPASS®

item.title: NASA's Space Center Admission Plus Houston City Tour
item.description: Hitting Houston's top attractions couldn't be easier than on this double-decker sightseeing tour. See top sights around the city like parks, landmarks, and historic districts, and then head to NASA’s Space Center Houston for a self-guided tour.

image.alt: NASA's Space Center Admission Plus Houston City Tour

item.title: Houston Ghosts and Hauntings By US Ghost Adventures
item.description: Learn about historic Houston's hauntings and the city’s spooky lore during this ghost walking tour around the city. A guide helps you safely navigate Houston at night with ease, from the La Carafe wine bar and Hotel ICON to Molly's Pub, and more. Hear about a side of town that most tourists never see, while listening to some of the city’s best ghost stories.

image.alt: Houston Ghosts and Hauntings By US Ghost Adventures

item.title: Space Center Houston Admission Ticket
item.description: The award-winning Space Center Houston is one of Houston’s most popular family attractions and takes visitors behind-the-scenes of the NASA Johnson Space Center. Filled with interactive exhibitions, multi-media displays, cutting-edge technology, and fascinating space artifacts, there’s something to amaze and entertain all ages.

image.alt: Space Center Houston Admission Ticket

item.title: Howdy H-Town Street Art & Small Bar Tour
item.description: “Grabbing drinks” is so passe. Instead, add some thrills to your weekend with this street art and local bar tour, turning downtown Houston into a sea of colorful nooks and crannies you’d never otherwise find. With two drinks included, your guide takes you from skyscrapers to dives, from sculptures to graffiti—in the wild way only Houston can.

image.alt: Howdy H-Town Street Art & Small Bar Tour

item.title: Museum of Fine Arts, Houston All Access Admission Ticket
item.description: Explore the Museum of Fine Arts, Houston on your own schedule when you book an admission ticket in advance. Great for groups or travelers on a time budget, booking ahead guarantees admission. Once in, make your way through the museum’s eclectic collections at your own pace. With more than 65,000 individual works for art from around the world, there's plenty to see.

image.alt: Museum of Fine Arts, Houston All Access Admission Ticket

item.title: Houston Walking Food Tour With Secret Food Tours
item.description: Try brisket eggrolls, tacos, Vietnamese chicken and rice, locally made ice cream, and more on this small-group walking food tour of Houston, Texas. Let your guide show you around the vibrant heart of the city and try a range of dishes influenced by a host of different cultures. Head off the usual tourist trail and learn all about Houston, its food scene, and its culture as you go.

image.alt: Houston Walking Food Tour With Secret Food Tours

item.title: The Escape Game Houston: Epic 60-Minute Adventures at City Centre
item.description: Enjoy a fun escape room experience at Houston’s CityCentre. Choose from different themed rooms, including Gold Rush, Prison Break, The Heist, Special Ops, and more. You and your group will then have 60 minutes to work together to find clues, solve puzzles, and complete your mission to escape the room in time.

image.alt: The Escape Game Houston: Epic 60-Minute Adventures at City Centre
